title: France coach crash
text: Eric Mc said: Noted.I just thought it was interesting to actually read the reports as they came in through the French media rather than the UK media.It is not uncommon for comments to be made on inaccurate reporting on PH. However, knowing PH, if I had criticised the BBC for errors in their report I probably would have been applauded.Sorry if I offended you. No apology necessary; I certainly wasn't offended. It's more that reporting on such scenes is inevitably patchy at the start - usually you're relying on what a policeman said to a bloke in the street, who then passed it on to the local music radio station - and things firm up once the flames are out and you've got a police media liaison on scene.
